mapper.select: SELECT browse_record_id AS browseRecordId, user_id AS userId, attraction_id AS attractionId, browse_duration AS browseDuration, browse_time AS browseTime, device_info AS deviceInfo, create_time AS createTime FROM user_browse_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND attraction_id = #{attractionId} AND browse_time >= #{startTime} ORDER BY browse_time DESC LIMIT 1
